name: EATON Component Stickersheet
description:
Ever growing collection of design components used by EATON digital designers, maintained by the Brightlayer User Interface team. Visit brightlayer-ui.github.io to see what we are doing ❤️


Changelog

Q4 2021

  • Added Progress Icons, EV-related icons and more.
  • Added multi-line text fields.
  • Renamed org name from "PX Blue" to "Brightlayer UI".


Q3 2021

  • This file is migrated from https://www.figma.com/community/file/852558784352181868 due to an organizational change.
  • Added new components for tables.
  • Added new OS-specific components, such as mouse cursors, browser bars, time pickers, status bars, etc.
  • Added 60+ new device- and channel-value-related icons. You can also find them on our website.
  • Icons (both Material Design and Brightlayer UI icons) are now searchable with their aliases.
